column3: Particularly frustrating if the user find themselves looking at a foreign language without knowing the first entry is always the default language.\n![Screenshot_86](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42591821/64033268-9ed85f00-cb3b-11e9-9b4e-f68e0522bbdf.png)\n

Concept NACK
Default isn't English, for me it is German because my system is on German.
This might be an issue of Windows
Qt uses stuff like the LANG environment variable to determine the language.
@emilengler can you do me a favor and try changing to default language - should be (Standard) in german? See what happens?
@GChuf I am already on default, default isn't English, it is dynamic based on systems preferences
@emilengler you were right - I was testing on linux just now and retesting on windows - it works like you said and I must have missed something when testing on windows. \nClosing the PR
